sentences.sContent: Do you have any flights to Miami?
sentences.sContent_eng: Do you have any flights to Miami?
sentences.sCn: 你们有飞迈阿密的班机吗？

sentences.sContent: Obviously that was the end of me in Miami.
sentences.sContent_eng: Obviously that was the end of me in Miami.
sentences.sCn: 很明显，这就是我在迈阿密的结局。

phrases.pCn: 迈阿密海滩（位于美国佛罗里达州）

trans.tranCn: 迈阿密(美国佛罗里州达东南部港市)
